Very nice game, a lot of hackers. Help me.

This game is rife with hackers.  Wallhacks, Aimbots proliferate the game and if you are not getting a lot of kills you get a low reputation and end up in games full of cheaters.  Two nice features are the death cam where you can see from the POV of whoever killed you or see what another player see's once you are dead.  This makes it a breeze to determine if someone is cheating, They aim at your team mates through multiple walls then they cheat. The bad side is there are so many that there is nothing they can really do to stop it. I know FPS games have an entire culture with websites devoted to cheating but this game really takes it to a whole new level.  Sad.

Muito bom, mas criem um servidor para Argentinos e companhia. Não falamos a mesma língua e nem somos tão ruins como os mesmos. Um beijo do marquito 😘

Un intemporel. J'ai commencé à jouer à ce jeu quand j'étais presque jeune, je continue alors que je suis presque vieux. On peut progresser, régresser, j'ai de la peine à retrouver encore les éléments qui m'ont paru la suite logique de Half-Life, mais en mode multi-joueur... Plein de serveurs plus tard, l'invasion des russes et quelques changements de nom, mais Counter Strike Global Offensive reste un des seuls jeux qui font monter ma tension lorsqu'une game se lance. Ce que je trouve (encore) positif.
Выдали вак. Не играл с говном. Игра сама по себе норм но много поцов с говном. Улу4шите анти 4ит.

впринципе игра не плохая, можно найти кентов, поиздеваться над турками, пошлушать поляков и тд, но друзья пропадают турки надоедабт как и поляки и игра становится рутиной, если есть с кем играть то валяйте, хоть меня здесь и кинули и играть можно, но радуга в сердце. а так 10дединсайдов из 10
Depois de ter jogado um pouco, posso dizer que é legalzinho 👍
